titlestmt.author: Eloise L. Morgan, Bronxville Village Historian

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid created with EADitor by user nybxlhr.
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English

did.abstract: A nearly complete collection of annual yearbooks published by the Bronxville High School, including duplicates of many years; five books for years 1927, 1961, 1980 1982, and 2000 are missing.

scopecontent.p: The collection is comprised of Bronxville High School yearbooks for the years 1925 through 2016, except for 1927, 1961, 1980, 1982, and 2000. The yearbooks are published annually by Bronxville High School and have been collected by the Bronxville Public Library and Bronxville Village Historians over the years. Currently Bronxville High School donates one copy of the latest yearbook to the History Center each spring. If you are interested in donating one of the missing yearbooks, please contact the Village Historian at geselbracht321@gmail.com.

userestrict.p: The collection is open by appointment for research at the Bronxville History Center, Bronxville Public Library, 201 Pondfield Road, Bronxville, New York. For appointment, contact the Village Historian at geselbracht321@gmail.com.
